title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 127.1 - Scope and purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 127.1 - Scope and purpose

State Regulations

This Part sets forth the procedures and policies to
establish and maintain the Special September Eleventh Bidders Registry created
by New York State Labor Law, section 349. T he purpose of this Part is to
establish procedures for the application process in which apparel manufacturers
and contractors may qualify for placement on the registry and the removal of
manufacturers and contractors from the registry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
127.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
